description: This Python script demonstrates how to use multiple MCP servers within a single agent, integrating tools like YFinance and MCPTools, and running an asynchronous agent to process a message, with example usage for generating a report.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an autonomous agent that can execute tasks using various tools.

classes.name: MCPTools
classes.description: A tool wrapper for interacting with MCP servers.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A tool wrapper for fetching financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs an agent with a specified message, configuring tools and instructions for processing.
